course.title: CSI 4115 Introduction to Compilers (3 units)
course.desc: Fundamental features of programming languages, functions of compilers, processors, preprocessors, and translators. Organization of compilers including compile-time and run-time symbol tables. Lexical and syntactic analysis. Object code generation. Error diagnostics.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: CEG 2136, (CSI 3120 or SEG 2106).
